report.title: Help for Detox?
report.author: Belle
report.bodytext: I just purchased this bottle for $30.00, a buck a pill. it says 600mg. I see things a bit sharper, and louder. I was told it helped with alcohol withdrawl, yet I cannot see that happening. Although, I do feel like running away, truely to the mountains or desert or just away. I have always enjoyed a earthly high (shrooms, pot) but I havn't done it too much.
